page.title: 09HEAGE RD INDUST.EST.RIPLEY
page.content: The industrial estate is to the S.W.of the town.It covers an area of about 2 hectares,and comprises:- OATES ELECTRICAL. Base,offices and stores. ECONOPACK LTD. Plastic extrusions.Manufacturers of pipes,window frames and plastic packs. AMBER VALLEY DISTRICT COUNCIL. Service Depot for vehicles.Used by Refuse lorries,Cleaning lorries,and Snow clearance vehicles etc. PARTRIDGE TRANSPORT. Trucks and trailers parked here.Also maintained here. STEVENSONS PLUMBERS. Storage of plumbing materials. HORTONS COACH HIRE. The coach are parked,cleaned and maintained here. INDUSTRIAL WASTE RECLAMATION. Waste paper stored before recycling.
